plot: We brought the movie Ghostbusters to life in the reading room of The New York Public Library at 42 Street. The 1984 movie begins in the very same room, so we figured it was time for the Ghostbusters to make an encore appearance.
title: Who You Gonna Call?
plot_es: We brought the movie Ghostbusters to life in the reading room of The New York Public Library at 42 Street. The 1984 movie begins in the very same room, so we figured it was time for the Ghostbusters to make an encore appearance.
